meanings.definition: To cause great damage or harm to something
meanings.sent1: The storm was destroying the old house.
meanings.sent2: The fire is destroying the forest.
meanings.sent3: The naughty puppy was destroying the pillows.
meanings.sent4: The virus is destroying the computer system.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake was destroying everything in its path.

meanings.definition: To completely ruin or demolish something
meanings.sent1: The wrecking ball was destroying the building.
meanings.sent2: The vandals are destroying the playground.
meanings.sent3: The kids were destroying the sandcastle they built.
meanings.sent4: The chef is destroying the competition with his signature dish.
meanings.sent5: The tsunami was destroying the coastal town.

meanings.definition: To put an end to the existence of something
meanings.sent1: The dictator is destroying freedom in the country.
meanings.sent2: The black hole is destroying stars in the galaxy.
meanings.sent3: The magician was destroying the evidence of his trick.
meanings.sent4: The superhero is destroying evil with his powers.
meanings.sent5: The time traveler was destroying paradoxes to save the future.
